objects.description: [menuPass](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0045) has attempted to get victims to open malicious files sent via email as part of spearphishing campaigns.

external_references.description: FireEye iSIGHT Intelligence. (2017, April 6). APT10 (MenuPass Group): New Tools, Global Campaign Latest Manifestation of Longstanding Threat. Retrieved June 29, 2017.
PwC and BAE Systems. (2017, April). Operation Cloud Hopper: Technical Annex. Retrieved April 13, 2017.
external_references.source_name: PWC Cloud Hopper Technical Annex April 2017
